products.name: OL Signature™
products.description: A next-generation automated solution to transform industries and redefine how intelligent assistance works in real-world environments. Premium service & delivery robot with advanced AI capabilities.
details: All-in-One Delivery, Greeting, and Navigation Robot
Responds Smartly to Human Presence with facial recognition
Boost Service Speed During Peak Hours
Navigate Crowds With Confidence and Control using LiDAR

products.name: OL Infinity
products.description: One bot. Endless roles. Smart service & delivery robot built for 24/7, high-speed autonomous logistics. Delivers goods across large spaces with zero manual effort and full precision.
details: Track Every Item in Real Time using SLAM tech
Advanced sensors ensure accurate delivery monitoring

products.name: OL Iron
products.description: Secure Deliveries. Seamless Automation. Advanced security robot with autonomous delivery capabilities designed for high-value items and sensitive materials.
details: Secure Delivery with Smart Locks and Authentication
Deliver High-Value Items with Zero Risk
Handle Sensitive Materials with Advanced Security Protocols
Protect Every Package from Pickup to Drop-off
Monitor Deliveries in Real-Time with Complete Transparency
Integrate Seamlessly with Existing Security Systems
Biometric access control and encrypted communication

products.name: OL Veltra
products.description: Smart Detection Made For Dynamic Retail Spaces. Advanced AI-powered detection and analytics robot specifically engineered for modern retail environments.
details: Track Customer Movement and Behavior Patterns Instantly
Detect Unusual Activity and Potential Security Threats
Monitor Inventory Levels and Product Placement in Real-Time
Analyze Foot Traffic and Shopping Trends for Better Insights
Provide Interactive Customer Assistance and Product Information
Generate Detailed Analytics Reports for Business Intelligence
Integrate with Existing Retail Management Systems
AI-powered customer behavior analysis and heat mapping
Loss prevention capabilities with smart alerts
Autonomous patrol routes with obstacle avoidance

products.name: OL Smart
products.description: See. Sense. Serve. Enclosed smart service & delivery robot designed for precision operations in hotels, workspaces, and hospitality environments.
details: Precision Operations for Hotels and Workspaces
Boost Room Service and Housekeeping Efficiency
Operate Smartly With IoT Sync Integration
Secure Items with Smart Delivery Locks
Free Staff to Focus on Guests' Experience
Handles internal deliveries and logistics with accuracy, security, and speed
Delivers essentials and automates in-room logistics for smoother guest experiences
Integrates with smart systems to optimize internal task flow and efficiency
Processes high-volume orders or tasks with no delay or misplacement

products.name: OL Echo
products.description: The Kiosk That Comes To Life. Premium conversational AI robot that transforms static information displays into dynamic, interactive experiences.
details: Information Finds You, Wherever You Happen Are
Kiosk Moves With Purpose and Precision
Ask, Tap, or Talk — Your Way
Smarter Than Static Screens Could Ever Be
Wayfinding, Promotions, and Service in One
Delivers real-time, location-specific updates to keep people informed on the move
Navigates busy spaces autonomously, pausing where demand and footfall are highest
Voice, touchscreen, or both together — Echo adapts to your preferred interaction
Content shifts intelligently based on location, time, or crowd, ensuring relevance

products.name: OL Envoro
products.description: Clean Spaces, No Traces. Smart waste collection robot that revolutionizes cleanliness with contactless, automated waste management for every industry.
details: Smart Navigation Brings Disposal to You
One Robot for Cleaning & Waste Collection
Just wave, and it glides over — no need to move around
Gesture sensors ensure touch-free, safe, and clean waste handling
No more searching — it finds you and collects waste instantly
All-in-one system that redefines waste collection and cleaning tasks with ease

products.name: OL Shine
products.description: Robots that work with you, not just for you. Advanced collaborative robot designed to work alongside human teams in various industrial applications.

products.name: OL Assistant AI
products.description: Natural conversations and real assistance, delivered with clarity. Advanced conversational AI system for customer service and business automation.

products.name: RoboGuard Pro
products.description: Advanced autonomous security patrol robot with AI-powered threat detection, perimeter monitoring, and real-time incident response capabilities.

products.name: CleanBot Elite
products.description: Professional autonomous cleaning robot with advanced navigation, multiple cleaning modes, and facility management integration for large commercial spaces.

products.name: MediBot Assistant
products.description: Specialized healthcare robot for patient assistance, medication delivery, and medical equipment transport in hospitals and healthcare facilities.
